FuncDef:
The activate module command changes the yang module type.
By default, only the yang module of the huawei-ip type takes effect.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the yang module name.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Warning: The huawei-ip will be inactive.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The activate module command changes the yang module type.
After the yang module is configured, the service needs to obtain the configuration information through the after script and perform related processing (for example, exclusive relationship processing).
